meanings.sent1: The movie was so suspenseless that I fell asleep.
meanings.sent2: The book's predictable plot made it a suspenseless read.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was so suspenseless that even the kids guessed it.
meanings.sent4: The speech was delivered in such a suspenseless manner that it felt like a lullaby.
meanings.sent5: The suspenseless atmosphere in the room made everyone yawn.

meanings.sent1: The party was so suspenseless that people left early.
meanings.sent2: The lecture was so suspenseless that students started doodling in their notebooks.
meanings.sent3: The suspenseless game show failed to keep the audience engaged.
meanings.sent4: The suspenseless announcement about the weather made everyone lose interest.
meanings.sent5: The suspenseless ending of the story left the readers disappointed.
